document_data.name: Blighted Grove
document_data.mainbody: The '''Blighted Grove''', also known as the '''Blighted Forest''' was a wild region of the [[Feywild]] that was corrupted by the malevolent influence of the dark [[fey]].
document_data.Description: The once-beautiful forest was tainted by the efforts of the [[fomorian]] king [[Malabog]] of the [[Feydark]], and the denizens of the [[dark fey enclave]] located elsewhere in the Feywild.
document_data.History:
After Malabog formed an alliance with the [[lich]] [[Valindra Shadowmantle]], ''circa'' the [[Faer√ªn]]ian {{yearlinkName|1479}}, he began a campaign of destruction and scourge against every living being within the Feywild. He inflicted the creatures and the plants of the forest with blight and disease, corrupting the very soil of the earth within the plane.

In response, the [[Iliyanbruen]] elves of [[New Sharandar (Feywild)|New Sharandar]] launched a campaign against the corruptive influence of Malabog and the dark fey. Under the leadership of [[Pelendethas Everstride]], they worked with adventurers to slay the evil creatures that overran the forest, destroyed and then healed the corrupted plants that took root in its earth, and nurtured new life by planting seedlings that had been enchanted by [[magic]].

Pelendethas uncovered the whereabouts of a particularly harmful fomorian champion that was known as the [[Scion of Corruption]], and enlisted the [[Hero of Sleeping Dragon Bridge]] to defeat the twisted giant.

Notable Locations.Landmarks:
* [[Gnarlroot cave]], an underground cave system that was corrupted by the [[red cap]] [[Grimak Nailbiter]].
* ''[[Wyldwood Gate]]'', a portal that linked the grove to New Sharandar.
